name: FightCamp
headline: Home boxing gym with motion trackers that compute punches and reps.
description: With FightCamp you get access to world-class boxing and kickboxing trainers, studio-quality equipment, and performance-tracking technology — all from the comfort of your home. The key to a FightCamp workout lies in our Punch Tracking technology — we allow you to measure every strike, deliver real-time stats and fuel your competitive side.

founders.name: Patrick Chandler, Founder/CMO
founders.description:
Currently running the FightCamp marketing team, deep knowledge in Paid Social (Facebook, Instagram), Content Marketing (Youtube, SEO), Website Optimization (CRO), Email marketing and Influencer marketing. Also created the attribution modeling framework and the data analysis system we use.

Ask me about marketing strategy, attribution, building a marketing team and marketing roadmaps / decision structures.

generated_description:
**FightCamp Overview**

Founded in 2014, FightCamp emerged from the Y Combinator Batch W16 and is based in Newport Beach, California. The company is on a mission to transform how people work out at home, specializing in boxing and kickboxing fitness. With a team of 64 employees and Michael Seibel serving as a Group Partner, FightCamp has positioned itself at the intersection of hardware, fitness, and gaming.

**The Concept**

The core idea behind FightCamp is simple yet powerful: create a home boxing gym that's as engaging and motivational as traditional fitness environments. Equipped with world-class boxing trainers and studio-quality gear, FightCamp brings performance-tracking technology right into your living room. Their signature Punch Tracking technology captures every punch, providing real-time stats and goals to keep users motivated and encouraged—perfect for those who thrive on competition.

**What You Get**

With FightCamp, you're not just signing up for workouts; you're getting an integrated fitness solution. Here’s what you can expect:

1. **Premium Equipment**: Each FightCamp package includes everything you need—engineered for durability and stability, their bags stay put while you unleash your power.
   
2. **Real-Time Tracking**: Their advanced technology tracks every punch, helping you measure your progress and push your limits. You can even compete with your friends in real time.
   
3. **Expansive Workout Library**: Users have access to a vast library of on-demand workouts led by expert trainers. From boxing fundamentals to cardio-heavy kickboxing sessions, there’s something for everyone.

4. **Mind & Body Workout**: Beyond physical fitness, FightCamp promotes mental clarity and stress relief, building not just strength but focus and resilience too.

**Community and Engagement**

FightCamp has cultivated a strong community with over 21,000 reviews and a near-perfect rating in app stores. Users share testimonials about how the program revitalized their workout routines, citing the variety and engagement of classes as key factors that keep them returning. 

**Current Promotions**

Recently, FightCamp has been running promotions like a free Partner Workout Pack—a $200 value—aimed at enticing new users to try the platform.

**Final Thoughts**

Whether you’re a boxing enthusiast or a total beginner, FightCamp provides an innovative, results-driven approach to home workouts. With a promise of mastering punches, boosting strength, and having fun in a supportive environment, it’s no surprise that FightCamp has taken the fitness world by storm. If you're ready to get into the ring, check them out at [FightCamp's website](http://joinfightcamp.com).
